Technique: FAYENCE; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; GLAZED
Name: Statuette of  Nefertem
Description: Nefertem is represented striding, his left foot advanced. He wears a short kilt, a tripartite wig, an artificial beard and a composite crown consisting of a stylized lotus flower and two feathers. The arms are pendant to the body, the fists are clenched. There is a small hole for suspending in the central part of the back pillar.
